input.sentences: i was so happy the day i graduated .
dad and big sister were so proud .
there were a lot of kids in my graduating class .
i think i was the happiest one though .
output.sentences: Happy to have graduated, the student took photos on the graduation day.
Her older sister was very proud, as well as her dad.
A lot of kids were graduating today.
That was the happiest moment to receive her certificate.
